summary: This document is a letter from TD Ameritrade to Jeffrey Epstein informing him of the termination of their business relationship. Epstein is required to either transfer his account to another brokerage or liquidate it by April 11, 2019. The letter outlines the restrictions placed on his account and the consequences of not complying with the instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the letter, which informs him of the termination of his account with TD Ameritrade.

events.title: Termination of Business Relationship
events.description: TD Ameritrade has decided to terminate its business relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, requiring him to close or transfer his account by this date.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Qtrs Ste B-3 St Thomas, VI 00802-1348
keyFacts: TD Ameritrade has terminated its business relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.
Epstein must either transfer his account or liquidate it by April 11, 2019.
His account has been restricted to liquidating transactions only.
